title: Keir Starmer – 2020 Letter on Government Limiting Media Access
author: admin
summary: Below is the letter sent by Keir Starmer, the Labour MP for Holborn and St Pancras, to Sir Mark Sedwill, the Cabinet Secretary, on 4 February 2020.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/keirstarmer1-219x300.jpeg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/keirstarmer1.jpeg)
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
